page.syntax: as P = a5_CreateLayoutFromDataSource(P ds ,C layoutType [,* connection [,C method [,C webProjectFolder ]]])

argument.name: Layout_Pointer
argument.description: A dot variable with the following elements.

item.name: .HasError
item.description: L An indication of whether an error occurred.

item.name: .TempFileName
item.description: C The name of the temporary layout.

argument.name: ds
argument.description: A Data_Source data structure that defines the data to be retrieved from a SQL back-end database.

argument.name: layoutType
argument.description:
Defines the type of layout to create. The options are:
"Report", "Letter", "Label"

argument.name: method
argument.description:
Optional. Default = "Prompt". Defines how to begin the user's layout definition experience. The options are:
"genie"
"editor"
"prompt"

page.description: Called to create a new layout after a DataSource has been defined. 'ds' defines the DataSource which can either be 'named' or 'adhoc'
page.discussion: The A5_CreateLayoutFromDataSource() function creates a new layout based on a DataSource definition.
